prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body portrait of a young woman standing center, pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich light and shadow variations and visible brushstrokes. A girl with an ordinary yet gentle appearance, soft facial features, warm fair skin, and a thoughtful, slightly apprehensive expression in her hazel eyes. Her face is round with a delicate nose and thin lips, conveying an innate kindness and vulnerability. She has long, light brown hair in loose waves, partially tied back with a simple ribbon, a few strands falling softly beside her cheeks. She wears a modest, knee-length dress in muted pastel colors like dusty rose or soft sage green, made of lightweight cotton or linen, with subtle floral embroidery along the collar and sleeves. The dress features a slightly high waist and long, gentle sleeves, reflecting the poetic and elegant aesthetic of the "City of Lumina". Her posture is slightly hesitant, hands gently clasped in front of her, embodying her ordinary yet empathetic nature. The overall atmosphere is tender and melancholic, with soft, diffuse lighting that highlights her introspective gaze and the delicate texture of her clothing, evoking a sense of budding wisdom and emotional depth. no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
